meanings.definition: Showing great sexual desire or interest.
meanings.sent1: She blushed at his randiest glance.
meanings.sent2: The randiest scene in the movie made her uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The randiest cat in the neighborhood kept following her around.
meanings.sent4: The randiest flower in the garden attracted all the bees.
meanings.sent5: His randiest thoughts always came to mind when he saw her.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a strong, uncontrollable desire for sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: The randiest couple in town was always the talk of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: After the party, she felt the randiest she had ever felt.
meanings.sent3: The randiest squirrel in the park was causing quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The randiest river flowed swiftly through the valley.
meanings.sent5: His randiest dreams always seemed to come true.
